questions_1.question: Identify the correct statements with reference to the ITT Indication system.
Options: The system consists of two semi-rigid thermocouple assemblies totaling ten probes with alternating immersions.
The system consists of two semi-rigid thermocouple assemblies totaling five probes with continuous immersions.
The system consists of two semi-rigid thermocouple assemblies averaged through a junction box at the 6 o'clock position on the turbine case.
The signal is never sent to the aircraft for display on EICAS.
questions_1.correctFeedback:
That's Correct!

You have chosen the correct option.
questions_1.InCorrectFeedback:
That's Incorrect!

You have chosen the wrong option. The valid answer is "The system consists of two semi-rigid thermocouple assemblies totaling ten probes with alternating immersions, The system consists of two semi-rigid thermocouple assemblies averaged through a junction box at the 6 o'clock position on the turbine case."
